CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'ICPC Home Study'),ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'Local Department Home'), ISPICKVAL( Type__c , 'CPA Home')) , Applicant_First_Name__c + ' ' + Applicant_Middle_Name__c+' '+ Applicant_Last_Name__c, Organization_Site_Name__r.Name)
CustomField.label: Provider Name
